workshoptitle: Oracle Database Security Hands-On Labs - Part2 (Advanced) - AVDF

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Understand the architecture of this workshop and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Initialize and Start the DBSecLab Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)
